Package: unacloud

[Groovy] Class User

    • unacloud.User

    • Entity to represent a User with access to UnaCloud.

      Authors:
      CesarF

      • Method Detail

        • java.lang.Object deprecate()

          Disables User and delete all components that user is owner

        • java.lang.Object existImage(java.lang.String name)

          Validates if currently user has an image with the same name. This avoids to override files in same folder.

          Parameters:
          name - of image
          Returns:
          true in case image exist in user false in case not

        • java.lang.Object getActiveDeployments()

          List active deployments which belong to user

          Returns:
          active deployments related to user

        • java.lang.Object getAvailableImages()

          Returns the list of images owned by user sorted by name and state AVAILABLE

          Returns:
          list of available images

        • java.lang.Long getDatabaseId()

          Returns database id

          Returns:
          Long id

        • java.lang.Object getGroupsWithRestriction(unacloud.share.enums.UserRestrictionEnum restriction)

          Searches and return a restriction in user group list

          Parameters:
          user - restriction to be requested
          Returns:
          all groups where exists the restriction, null if does not exist

        • java.lang.Object getNotAvailableImages()

          Returns the list of images owned by user sorted by name and state different to AVAILABLE

          Returns:
          list of not available images

        • java.lang.Object getOrderedClusters()

          Returns the list of clusters owned by user sorted by name

          Returns:
          list of sorted cluster

        • java.lang.Object getOrderedImages()

          Returns the list of images owned by user sorted by name

          Returns:
          list of sorted images

        • java.lang.Object getRestriction(unacloud.share.enums.UserRestrictionEnum restriction)

          Searches and return a restriction in user restriction list

          Parameters:
          user - restriction to be requested
          Returns:
          a requested restriction of user, null if does not exist

        • boolean isAdmin()

          Validates if user is administrator

          Returns:
          true is user is admin, false is not
